sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; function EditContact({ onSave }) { const navigate = useNavigate(); const initialContact = useLocation().state; const [contact, setContact] = useState(initialContact); const inputChange = (e) => { console.log(e.target); const { name, value } = e.target; setContact({ ...contact, [name]: value, }); }; const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); await onSave(contact); navigate("/"); }; return (
); } export default EditContact;
